text: En ovaviba me mɨghsɨar kamɨn uari akuva, egha Godɨn ziam fe. Ezɨ ia Judaba ghaze, danganir gumaziba mangɨva Godɨn ziam fam, a Jerusalemɨn iti.”(4:20) Mɨghsɨar amizir kam an gun mɨgeim, a Gerazimɨn Mɨghsɨam, a Samarian Distrighɨn iti. Samarian gumazamiziba mɨghsɨar kamra ghuava Godɨn ziam fe. Nɨ deragh foghsɨ, Luk 9:53ɨn vezɨn itir akamɨn gan.
